details.text: Wrong Display Name 'Patient summary Document' for http://loinc.org#60591-5. Valid display is one of 2 choices: 'Patientenkurzakte - Dokument' (de-DE) or 'Patient Summary' (de-AT) (for the language(s) 'de-CH')

None of the codings provided are in the value set 'FHIR Document Type Codes' (http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/doc-typecodes|4.0.1), and a coding is recommended to come from this value set (codes = http://loinc.org#60591-5)

Can't find 'Patient/1' in the bundle (Composition.subject). Note that there is a resource in the bundle with the same type and id, but it does not match because of the fullUrl based rules around matching relative references. Found 'Patient/1', but it doesn't match because of the source fullUrl 'Composition/1'

Can't find 'Device/1' in the bundle (Composition.author). Note that there is a resource in the bundle with the same type and id, but it does not match because of the fullUrl based rules around matching relative references. Found 'Device/1', but it doesn't match because of the source fullUrl 'Composition/1'
Entry 'Patient/1' isn't reachable by traversing links (forward or backward) from the Composition
Entry 'Device/1' isn't reachable by traversing links (forward or backward) from the Composition
The fullUrl must be an absolute URL (not 'Composition/1')
The fullUrl must be an absolute URL (not 'Patient/1')
The fullUrl must be an absolute URL (not 'Device/1')
